title: Interpretation of nails in a dream - seeing broken nails in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of nails being long or short, cut, stuck, falling, polished, broken, dirty, white, black, or colored in the dream of an unmarried, married, pregnant girl. Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, others. Interpretation of nails in a dream. Claws in a dream in general. To enemies and their victory. Disease in the nails indicates impotence and corruption in religion and affairs. The length of nails is sadness. Whoever dreams that he has no nails is broke. If he dreams that his nails are broken, he will die. Whoever sees in his dream that his nails are very long, this is a sign that he will make abundant profit and that good nutrition awaits him. Whoever dreams that he is careful not to break his nails and takes care of them, this is a sign that his practical and vital powers will increase, and that his share will be abundant money. Whoever sees in his dream that his victory is greater than his opponents, this indicates his victory over them, professionally or socially. Whoever dreams that If his nails are white, this is a sign of protection and protection from the temptations of life and walking in a straight and healthy line. Whoever sees in his dream that some of his nails are missing or missing, this indicates that he will lose a lot of his wealth if he is wealthy and if he has a balance in the bank, he will lose it. If you dream that You cut your nails with a sharp tool, not nail clippers, and you feel pain, this means that you will make a decision to get rid of something that is bothering you in your life, and getting rid of this problem will lead to change, but this change will harm you even if it is in your best interest. If you dream that you cut your nails with scissors or nail clippers to put them in order And cleaning them, this indicates a renewal workshop that will begin in your life on a professional, emotional or social level. If the appearance of your nails is beautiful and clean after trimming, this means that the change steps you have adopted will succeed, but if their appearance is distorted and not beautiful, this warns you that failure may occur. It creeps into your work. If you dream that you are cutting someone's nails, it means that you will be supportive of that person and help him overcome a problem and make a change in his life. If you are wearing nail polish in a dream, it means that you need to pay more attention to yourself, as The topic warns you that it is your duty to pay more attention to what you are doing or to any goal you want to achieve, you need to insist more to make it successful. On the other hand, if you are wearing nail polish and want to change it in the dream, this indicates that you are a very emotional and creative person. It is also Nail polish colors in a dream have many meanings. If the nail polish is blue, violet, dark green, or another unusual and intense color, it means that you are a free person who likes to express himself in a unique way. In addition, if the nail polish you use in... Dreaming about transparent means that you are a transparent and objective person in talking about matters that concern you and affect you directly. Whoever sees during his sleep that he is pulling out his nails, this is a clear indication that he will experience serious experiences on the family or emotional level. Pulling out a nail in a dream is a merchant or a man Business symbolizes a major financial loss or lack of success

title: Interpretation of the appearance of dough in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of dough in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, dough is a mixture of many ingredients that are used for many purposes and foods, and there are many ways to prepare it. There are many different and conflicting interpretations of the meaning associated with yeast, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of the appearance of yeast in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi.Interpretation of the dream of seeing dough in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said: Dough in a dream is permissible money. When it ferments, you will have it and it will be abundant. If it does not ferment, it is spoiled and you will not get it easily. If the dough becomes sour, you are on the verge of losing. Seeing the dreamer fermenting barley flour dough indicates that he will be victorious over his enemies. He is a good and honest man.” Interpretation of dreams to see dough in a dream. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi said: Seeing dough brings comfort and reassurance to both the prisoner and the pregnant woman, and the dough appears in a place that indicates money and benefiting from it, and if the dough is sour without need, then this is evidence. He will lose money.” Interpretation of a dream about seeing dough in a dream in general. Whoever saw in a dream that he was cutting dough into small pieces indicates that the dreamer manages his financial affairs well and that he does not spend money inappropriately. Seeing dough indicates a lot of money that will come from a source It is permissible. Eating raw dough indicates haste in matters, so the fortuneteller is required to be patient. Whoever dreams of kneading dough in a dream indicates the arrival of a traveler. Seeing dough in a dream that is rotting means that the dreamer is spending his money on things that will not be used and that are out of place. Seeing barley flour dough In the dream, it indicates that the dreamer is a good and honest person who will triumph over his enemies and succeed in life. Anyone who dreams of eating bran indicates poverty. Seeing dough not kneaded in a dream means that the dreamer will not get money easily and will stumble. Whoever bakes dough in a dream will get what He wants. When you see dough drunk, you will get halal money from a successful and profitable business. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dough in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees dough in a dream, this indicates her purity, morals, and good reputation among people. An unmarried woman who sees dough In a dream, and it was ready, it indicates that her desire and the dreams she wants will come true, and it also indicates that the date of her wedding is approaching. A single woman seeing pastry dough indicates a happy occasion. Seeing an unmarried woman eating dough in a dream while it is raw indicates speed and she needs to be patient. If An unmarried woman saw dough in a dream and it was solid, this means that she will achieve the things she wants and indicates her victory. If an unmarried girl is kneading dough in a dream and in a large place, this indicates her marriage. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dough in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees dough In a dream, it indicates the good deeds that she does towards her family, her father, and her mother, and if the dough spoils, her husband loses his job. A married woman sees dough or

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an eagle and its meaning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an eagle by Ibn Sirin According to Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of seeing an eagle carries good connotations and connotations of the honor of seeing an eagle. It can be a harbinger of success in something or the appearance of happy things, but on the contrary, the eagle can be a harbinger of bad luck and failure for the one who has the vision, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing an eagle in a dream for a single woman. The appearance of an eagle in an unmarried girl’s dream has connotations. Many are good, whether it is success, travel, money, or marriage. Interpretation of seeing an eagle for a married woman: A married woman’s vision of an eagle in her dream is often related to her husband. If she sees an eagle flying above her in the dream, this indicates the care, attention and love she witnesses from her husband. About the arrival of blessing in the house. What was said about the evil in this vision is that a married woman sees in her dream a dead or slaughtered eagle, then this indicates illness, death, or poverty, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing an eagle for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees an eagle in her dream, this A good omen for good luck and that she will give birth to a son, and God knows best. It also portends happy news. Interpretation of the colors of the eagle in a dream. The dreamer may see in his dream an eagle of white or black, and each color has an independent interpretation. The white eagle is a sign of good news, whether it is money or livelihood. Legally, marriage or blessing. On the contrary, the black eagle, which indicates death, illness, separation, and martyrdom, especially if the dreamer is a woman and can also indicate the presence of a malicious or unfair person in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a flying eagle in a dreamIf the eagle in the dreamer’s dream flies low, this indicates Bad luck, and if the dreamer sees himself as the owner of an eagle, but it flies from his hands and goes far into the sky and does not return, then this indicates bad health and the term is approaching, but if it appears or returns, this is evidence of an accident occurring to the sighted person, whether it is an accident or an illness that will lead to death, but he will survive, with permission. God. .

title: Interpretation of seeing a pointer in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Al-Usaimi.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the pointer in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Al-Assimi according to what was presented by the translator Muhammad bin Sirin in his book Interpretation of Dreams. About a person who sees his fingers in a strange shape, and when he wakes up from his sleep, he is surprised by this vision and gets angry to know its interpretation and whether it has a specific interpretation or is it just an illusion. The dream has no meaning or significance, and the scholars of interpretation say that this vision varies according to the social, psychological or health status of the person who sees it, so in this article we will gather together to interpret the dropping of the index finger in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and Al-Assimi. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the index finger in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says in his book Interpretation of Dreams that the fingers in a dream refer to the father or mother and may symbolize the wife or children. If the sleeper sees in his dream that the index finger has a large wound, this is an unpleasant vision and indicates that the dreamer is wasting money and must be moderate in spending. If the sleeper sees in his dream that the index finger is bleeding, this is an unpleasant vision that indicates poverty and loss of blessing. Whoever sees in his dream that his index finger is bleeding, and he puts his finger in his mouth to let the blood come out, this is evidence that the dreamer commits forbidden acts, and commits many sins, and he must repent to God Almighty. Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing the fingers of the right hand in a dream indicates the five daily prayers. If the sleeper sees the index finger in his dream, it indicates the noon prayer, and the thumb indicates Fajr prayer, and the middle finger in a dream symbolizes the afternoon prayer, and the finger in a dream indicates the sunset prayer, while the pink color indicates. It indicates the evening prayer. Seeing the fingers of the right hand in a dream indicates the nieces or nephews. Interpretation of a dream about seeing fingers in a dream, Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation Imam Al-Nabulsi says in his book that fingers in a dream indicate the power, influence, authority and prestige that the dreamer will achieve in his life. If the sleeper sees in his dream that the number of fingers on his hand has become more than usual, this is a good vision that promises him great and blessed sustenance, and this vision may indicate righteous offspring. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that the fingers of his hand begin to descend, this is an unpleasant vision and indicates the loss of a lot of money in the coming period. If a person sees in his dream that his finger is cut off, this indicates that he was expecting a great benefit, but that will not happen at all. If the dreamer is a sultan or a ruler and sees in his dream that the fingers of his hand are cut off, this is a sign of the loss of soldiers. Imam Al-Nabulsi says: If the sleeper sees in his dream that the fingers of his hand have become close together, this is evidence of his weakness in his work and in the duties required of him. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is tying his fingers, this is a sign that the dreamer will enter into a contract in the coming period. Interpretation Dream of seeing fingers in a dream, Al-Osaimi’s interpretation Dr. Fahd Al-Osaimi says that seeing fingers in a dream carries many different indications that differ according to the condition of the fingers in the dream. Seeing five fingers in a dream can mean that the dreamer is

title: Interpretation of a dream about a child washing feces in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a child washing excrement in a dream. There are many meanings to seeing yourself washing excrement, so we learn about the dream interpretation of a child washing excrement in a dream, all of this and more details.. Interpretation of a dream about a child washing excrement in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a child washing excrement in a dream. It can lead to good deeds, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer dreams of washing his child with water, then he has care, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen washing the child from her excrements, she will recover, and God knows the unseen. When you see a child washing excrement in a dream, this may indicate the release of anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about washing. Dishes in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about washing dishes in a dream could be evidence of purity, and God knows the unseen. When you see a single girl washing dishes in a dream, this could be evidence of cleanliness and purity, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself washing the dishes, this may be evidence of good changes, and God knows the unseen. I know the unseen. Also, seeing washing dishes in a dream can mean that it can lead to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees herself bathing with milk, this may be a sign that she is far from committing sins and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: The most unusual interpretations of hugging the dead in a dream, hugging the dead in a dream with crying, hugging and kissing the dead in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the bosom of a dead person in a dream is one of the most famous visions that conveys to you a set of indicators that convey to you some good and bad things. Al-Nabulsi: Seeing the dead in a dream is evidence of psychological comfort and the utmost happiness in life, because it symbolizes the great good that the visionary will soon gain, so let us learn together the complete interpretations of seeing hugs from the dead in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hugging a dead person in a dreamIf one sees in his dream that If one embraces the dead, he feels anxious, which indicates that there are bad things that the dreamer will be exposed to in the coming period of his life. Interpretation of the living embracing the dead: A person sees in his dream that the dead person is hugging him. The vision suggests that the dreamer remembers this person a lot and speaks well about him, and always remembers him with prayers. I dreamed of kissing and hugging my deceased mother: A married woman seeing her mother dead indicates that she will enjoy a stable and happy married life. Hugging a dead mother in a dream is evidence that the mother feels that her son or daughter is feeling sad. Fatigue and this embraceIt is evidence that tension will disappear and that seeing a dead mother in a dream indicates mercy, problems will end, and marriage is imminent. Interpretation of dreams of a dead person embracing a living person: If the dreamer sees in his dream that the deceased aspires to him or wants to take him, then it is a vision that indicates the imminent death of the dreamer And God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of a father kissing his daughter: A father and his daughter embracing in a dream is an expression of his love for her and his satisfaction with her, because it predicts the end of sadness, the release of tension, and predicts the achievement of safety. And joy and happiness in the future and portends a prosperous future and a long life, God willing. Embracing the dead in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of hugging the dead and crying by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says if you see a dead person hugging you, taking you tightly in his arms and crying loudly, then this vision is a warning and shows that the dreamer will lose Debt due to drowning in sins. Interpretation of a dream about hugging a dead person: Embracing the dead person in a dream and feeling love and tenderness in his embrace is evidence of the dreamer’s long life or that he always prays for the dead person and reminds him of reading the Qur’an and giving. Charity. Ibn Sirin explained that whoever sees in his dream that he is kissing a person, this indicates their good relationship, and if he is a husband and sees that he is kissing his wife, or vice versa, then this is evidence of their good relationship. And mutual trust. . If a person dreams that he is embracing someone without feelings of love, this indicates that his relationship will develop and his feelings will improve. And if he embraces the dead person, it indicates his love for the dead person, and his many prayers for him, and his embrace shows his joy and happiness in what he is doing for him. The vision may also indicate a long journey or migration. If he embraces a dead person known for his faith and piety, the vision shows that the dreamer is firmly on the right path and must continue and persevere in it. Ibn Sirin said that embraces in general, whether alive or dead, indicate the dreamer’s long life. The interpretation of the dead person’s embrace for the living is Evidence that the dreamer will live long and indicates the disappearance of his anxiety and the disappearance of his problems if the dreamer feels love and comfort. However, if he sees

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing a rocky mountain in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of climbing a rocky mountain in a dream, in the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of climbing a rocky mountain in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he is climbing a rocky mountain indicates his need to achieve his goals and ambitions. Climbing a rocky mountain in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will search for safety and comfort. If One saw that he was climbing a rocky mountain, this may indicate the fulfillment of demands and dreams by God’s grace. The dream of climbing a rocky mountain is likely an indication of getting rid of the difficulties and problems that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing a high place In a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he was able to climb to a very high place could be a sign of the fulfillment of desires and dreams. Dreaming of climbing a high place in a dream may be a sign of the effort and effort that the dreamer is making to achieve his ambitions. In the event that one sees himself climbing High in a dream, this may indicate that he will get what he wants during this period. If a person sees that he has climbed to a high place, it may indicate the abundance of goodness and the enormous livelihood that the dreamer will obtain during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing the stairs of a mosque in a dream may Climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream indicates some difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Whoever dreams that he is climbing the stairs may indicate that there are some obstacles in his life that stand in the way of his dreams. Seeing yourself climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream may indicate That you are moving away from God, Blessed and Most High, and you need to repent and return to God, Blessed and Most High. A dream of climbing the mosque tower in a dream may be a sign of bad changes occurring in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about climbing an elevator in a dream If someone sees himself climbing the elevator This may indicate good changes occurring in his life during this time. A person’s dream that he was climbing an escalator may indicate the ease and comfort he is enjoying at that time. Seeing himself climbing an escalator in a dream may indicate that goals and ambitions will be easily achieved during this time. Period. Seeing the elevator going up in a dream may indicate happy events that will come to it during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing the stairs in a dream. Climbing the stairs in a dream may mean achieving goals and ambitions during this time, and God knows best. Dreaming of climbing the plane stairs in a dream may indicate To be close to God Almighty, and avoid sins and disobedience. In the event that someone saw that he was climbing the stairs of an airplane, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life during those days. Dreaming of climbing the stairs in a dream can indicate joyful changes and control over circumstances. A difficult life, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream about climbing the stairs with difficulty in a dream. Climbing the stairs with difficulty may indicate the dreamer’s suffering in his life during those days. Anyone who dreams of climbing the stairs with difficulty can indicate a difficulty that the dreamer may suffer from during those days. Anyone who sees in his dream that Climbing stairs with difficulty may indicate severe pain

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing someone fishing in a dream for Ibn Sirin’s married wife

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fish in a dream for a married woman. Seeing fish is one of those visions that carry many meanings and messages, but what about seeing fishing? What is its importance? This vision carries many interpretations that differ based on many considerations, including that fishing may be with a hook, net, or hand, and the fish may be colored or dead. What concerns us in this article is that we list all the details and different cases of seeing fishing in a dream, especially for a married woman. Learn about the interpretation of seeing someone fishing in a dream for Ibn Sirin's married wife. Seeing fishing in a dream for a married woman Seeing a fish in her dream expresses her principles in life, her spiritual beliefs, her personal beliefs, her ideals and highest values, interest in the spiritual side of her personality and the development of her lifestyle. This vision also indicates fertility, growth, development, the birth of ideas, facing discussions that may be useless, the need to make certain decisions that may not be appropriate, and the need to fight battles and challenges with others. If she sees that she is fishing, this indicates achieving benefit and satisfying a need, the death of distress and distress, liberation from restrictions and burdens, reaping many fruits, and receiving good news that brings joy to people. Her life. This vision can refer to the mistakes that you continue to fall into, the complex problems and issues that you find difficult to solve, the sins that you commit without having the ability to fight them, and the failure to perform the tasks that you have. And if she sees that she is fishing from murky waters, this indicates a succession of crises, the accumulation of worries and secret desires, the spread of sadness in her life, the instability of her circumstances, and the passage of difficult and dry conditions. And it leaves traces in it that are difficult to erase easily. But if the water is pure, this indicates sustenance, good news, happy circumstances, good offspring, purity of heart, purity of heart, sincerity of intentions, determination, and turning to God with a humble heart. But if you see her fishing a fish from the well, this indicates a great sin or a serious mistake, stumbling and difficulty in achieving the goal and a wrong path that highlights the extent of her foolishness and narrow-mindedness of events. Position around it. Seeing Ibn Sirin's married wife fishing in a dream Ibn Sirin sees that seeing fish indicates benefits, blessings, sustenance, facilitation, bringing comfort closer, getting out of hardships and crises, overcoming hardships and severe disturbances in life, and feeling grateful and thankful. This vision also expresses the love that fills her heart, patience in sadness and hardship, gratitude in prosperity and hardship, perseverance, mastery of work, honesty in it, avoiding fun, falsehood and flattery, walking in clear paths, and leaning towards honesty and transparency. If a woman sees that she is fishing, this indicates childbirth, if she deserves it, sustenance with good offspring, a high percentage of her income, and opens a door for her to earn a living and the end of hardship. It has also historically passed through the death of courts
